Title: Projecturo
Description: Projecturo is a .NET based project management and ticketing tool (issue/task/feature tracking). It makes it very easy to manage your software development projects, tasks and tickets (bug, issues, features). It is developed in C# (.NET 3.5).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Projecturo is a .NET based project management and ticketing tool (issue/task/feature tracking). It makes it very easy to manage your software development projects, tasks and tickets (bug, issues, features). It is developed in C# (.NET 3.5).

Current Status

Currently there is no public release as the project is still on its beginning. But Projecturo is under heavy development. To get an overview of the current progress, please have a look at the status page. Visit the Issue Tracker to get a list of currently open tasks, issues and features. Feel free to add your bugs and features there.

Requirements
  • .NET Framework 3.5 SP 1
  • SQL Server 2005/2008 (another DBMS can be used)
  • Windows XP/Vista/7
  • Latest Version of WPF Toolkit
